column5: http://www.cbsnews.com/news/fisherman-catches-bass-with-mcdonalds-mcnugget/  LOL, if I had only known!
That's for Yankee bass. Use Timbits here ?
I seem to remember a few years ago, a member here caught a bass in Florida on vacation using a hotdog wiener.
Used to use chunks of hot dog wieners as bait when I was a kid on Lake Aquataine. Caught quite a few Catfish and the odd Largemouth this way. lol
Still works. My buddy and I fished Aquataine last week like that.
That's for Yankee bass. Use Timbits here  LOL, I had to look up Timbits, dough balls are for carp!
Used to use chunks of hot dog wieners as bait when I was a kid on Lake Aquataine. Caught quite a few Catfish and the odd Largemouth this way. lol   Walking the dog? the new stick bait?
Let me add to the mix So have a good lunch and then go for it
gummy worms work. Friend of mine used a hunk of apricot once...that didn't
That's for Yankee bass. Use Timbits here What flavor works best??
Hahahah I actually tried this for walleye and it worked surprisingly well
Still works. My buddy and I fished Aquataine last week like that. there is fish in aquitaine??

I shouldn't be sharing this but, a few decent bass (a pound or two) lots of carp, crappie the size of your palm and lots of bullhead about the same size. You won't set any records but it's a great way to spend the day if you can't get out of the city.
Let me add to the mix So have a good lunch and then go for it   LOL, lures by KFC? Maybe some garlic bologna chunk trailers?

I shouldn't be sharing this but, a few decent bass (a pound or two) lots of carp, crappie the size of your palm and lots of bullhead about the same size. You won't set any records but it's a great way to spend the day if you can't get out of the city.   Shame on you.
I'm a fan of city fishing. Keeps people out of my real spots.
I'm a fan of city fishing. Keeps people out of my real spots.   LOL I hear ya bud. Yanked ya in. LOL
this is by far the best one

Think I mentioned this before but years ago my uncle caught a beauty steelhead on a buttercup.
Shore fishing in Miami.
